message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly valuable for you. I'm initially proposing a price of $11,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Bob.  While $9,000 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This product truly offers significant value, and I believe this is a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $9,500?
